title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4812.3 - Issuance by clerk
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4812.3 - Issuance by clerk

State Regulations
A copy of the findings and determination of the municipal
governing body shall be sent to the clerk of the municipality who shall issue
the license if the application is approved. If the application is not approved, the clerk of the municipality shall give due notice to the applicant in writing
of a hearing to be held upon the qualifications of the applicant and the merits
of the application. A copy of such notice shall be furnished the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4812.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
